game.name: Hexa Puzzle
game.description:
Do you think that you are an expert in solving tricky puzzles? If yes, the brain-storming puzzle challenges available in this brand new arcade game can provide you with a wonderful environment to have fun. Your objective is to drag the hexagon blocks to fill up the board that you can see in front of your screen in Hexa Puzzle. You have to keep your brain active and put your quick reflexes and concentration to the test to complete all challenging levels.

Do not need to bother in case if you are stuck as you can click the hint button to take an idea of where to place a set of hexagons. Choose from Beginner, Advanced, Master and Expert level and start having fun alone or with your friends! Make sure to fill up all the grids of the board with the pieces. There are four difficulty levels and each level includes 60 stages to enjoy. This means that the number of fun challenges is 240 so there would be no chance of getting bored.

The difficulty level will keep increasing as you move the next level in this match 3 puzzle challenge. Use your brain to arrange all the tiles in their original position and enter the advanced level! Fill the voids and match up with each other in this classic dissection html5 mobile game! Use your mouse or tap the screen to drag and drop the multiple shapes and prove yourself to become the champion of puzzles! Check out more highly-addictive arcade games for kids that are free to play online, no download required!
